title: Mathematical eye
creator_credit: Yorkshire Television, Adam Hart-Davis, Colin Nobbs and Mike Cocker
brief_description: A series of 20 minute programs designed to help students understand mathematical concepts and relate them to the real world. The programs use computer graphics and animation to assist students in visualising problems and solutions.
creator_credit_for_label: Yorkshire Television, Adam Hart-Davis, Colin Nobbs and Mike Cocker
